name: THE Best Text Adventure (You Ever Done Did Play)
name_original: THE Best Text Adventure (You Ever Done Did Play)
description:
Shining Kitten Games presents... THE Best Text Adventure (You Ever Done Did Play)*! This short text adventure was created for the Gameboy in GB Studio. It features a simple interface and plenty of home-grown humor. Please enjoy <3

*Shining Kitten Games does not guarantee this is the best text adventure you ever done did play.

If you have any inquiries or bugs to report, contact us at ShiningKittenGames@gmail.com

Note: Saving is implemented, but does not work on certain flashcarts. A compatibility list may be available at some point, but due to our small team, it's unknown how many carts are affected. We thank you for your understanding.
